details: When youre dealing with missing, broken, or severely damaged teeth, your confidence can suffer. More importantly, these issues take a toll on your health. You deserve better. Talk to us about dental implant restorations.

Root canals are probably the most notorious procedure in dentistry, but also the most misunderstood. While many people view them as “scary,” the truth is that a root canal is an effective treatment to stop pain and save your tooth.

Our first priority is to save your tooth, but when tooth damage is so extensive that it cannot be repaired, a dental extraction may be necessary. Additionally, wisdom teeth often need to be extracted to make room in your jaw or improve your dental health.
